scripts.dev: concurrently -n WIDGET,HOST -c magenta,cyan "npm -w apps/3d-widget run dev" "npm -w apps/web-host run dev"
scripts.dev:compare: concurrently -n WIDGET,HOST,COMBINED -c magenta,cyan,yellow "npm -w apps/3d-widget run dev" "npm -w apps/web-host run dev" "npm -w apps/combined-app run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w apps/3d-widget run build && npm -w apps/web-host run build
scripts.preview: npm run build && concurrently -n WIDGET,HOST -c magenta,cyan "npm -w apps/3d-widget run preview" "npm -w apps/web-host run preview"
